plot outline: karthik, a software engineer loves a girl Jhansi. she was a girl with short temper, unable to analyse the situation in a positive way. while karthik is a energitic guy and always get locked before Jhansi. They quarrel each other and then both unknowingly travel to Australia. Karthik come across Deepika in the flight and makes friendship with her. Deepika and Jhansi lives together, while Jhansi continues to hate Karthik. Karthik tries to reunite with Jhansi with the help of Deepika but everything goes into vain. Meanwhile Deepika starts loving Karthik by knowing his character and openess. whom Karthik will marry is the twist in the story
title: Neevalle Neevalle
